siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Winter is not over yet. Jon spent nearly 2 hours shoveling after the most recent snow storm. Stan asks Jon about snow removal tools and discovers that he finally ordered a snowblower! Somewhere in there we go off on a tangent on Star Trek. All weekend Stan wasâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Episode 31 - Snow, Football, Star Trek and Twitter
